attributes.review: I downloaded the app to look into bettering my country, only when I opened the app, the first thing I saw was a racist white supremacists. It was contradictory because I downloaded the app in order to make america great, but the app was supporting one of the many people doing the exact opposite. I would not recommend getting this app because it promotes a hateful man who only cares about himself. Honestly, I think this app should be taken off the market.
